summary.span: 提供可在运行时检索类型相关信息的方法。

span.span: Provides methods that retrieve information about types at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回在指定类型上定义的所有事件，包括继承的、非公共的、实例和静态事件。This method returns all events defined on the specified type, including inherited, non-public, instance, and static events.
